subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Hiroki Kuroda has the lowest earned run average of any Yankees starter with more than five starts, but since the team has a policy of not negotiating contract extensions during the season, they risk losing him.
snippet: Hiroki Kuroda has the lowest earned run average of any Yankees starter with more than five starts, but since the team has a policy of not negotiating contract extensions during the season, they risk losing him.
